text: Kamer Genç (February 23, 1940 - January 22, 2016) was a Turkish politician. He was a member of parliament as a member of the Republican People's Party in the 18th, 19th, and 23rd election cycles, and in the 20th and 21st as a member of the True Path Party. He was born in Nazımiye, Tunceli Province. Genç died of cancer in Istanbul, Turkey on January 22, 2016 at the age of 75.Outspoken former Turkish deputy Kamer Genç dies of cancer aged 75 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1940 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Turkey Category:Turkish politicians Category:Zaza
title: Kamer Genç
